member.reward: and receives the role {{role}} as a reward

general.botBirthday: Happy birthday to me! I'm now {{age}} years old!

invalidArg.cmd: This is not a valid command
invalidArg.category: Warning: {{cmds}} doesn't have a valid category

notLocalized.cmd: Error: this command is not localized!
notLocalized.rank: Error: this rank is not localized!

notFound.rankReward: No reward found for this rank
notFound.video: I couldn't find a video matching what you entered. :thinking: Try again with something different!
notFound.voiceChannel: You are not in a voice channel!
notFound.defaultChannel: The default channel doesn't exist, using backup channel (use {{prefix}}setchannel to change the default channel)

tooMuch.cmdsUser: You have too many custom commands!
tooMuch.chars: You have more than {{max}} characters! Please enter less.

error.groupDuplicate: This user already is in this group!
error.ytdlError: This video could not be downloaded (maybe unavailable?).
error.formatError: Please format the date using ISO 8601 (yyyy-mm-dd or --mm-dd)
error.notInteractiveMode: Error: it looks like this command doesn't support interactive mode yet!
error.notArray: Error: the variable {{var}} should be an array

database.noVersion: Could not find database version. Starting from baseline.
database.newVersion: Database version outdated. Updating from version {{current}} to version {{new}}

help.msg: For more information about a command and its usage, type '{{config.prefix}}help CommandName'.
Display all commands or help for a specific command

say.msg: Send a message into the channel

top.msg: Display local and global leaderboard in terms of XP

gif.msg: Searche for a gif or sends a trending GIF if there is no argument

createcmd.msg: Add a custom cmd. <arg> is what will be said when executed

listcustomcmd.msg: List all custom commands by default. You can add an user to list all of his commands or you can add a command for more information about it.

play.msg: Put a song in queue and play it

stop.msg: Make the bot leave the voice channel

warnlist.msg: List warnings of an user or all users

warnpurge.msg: Remove all warnings from an user or all users

clearlog.msg: By default, delete bot commands. Can also be used with filters.

setchannel.msg: Change the channel for announcements from the bot

setreward.msg: Set a role or a group as a reward for the rank

unsetreward.msg: Unset the reward of a rank

ping.pong:
Pong!
*Ping received after {{ping}} ms. Average heartbeat ping of {{heartbeatPing}} ms.*
